Author: Visual Studio Code
Title: VS Code - 2025 Wrapped with Burke Holland and Pierce Boggan
Description:
Burke and Pierce sit down to review a full year of releases, surprises, partnerships, and AI goodies in VS Code from 2025!

Chapters: 00:00 Intro & why this year matters 01:00 Copilot Free & Universe: the acceleration moment 06:00 Agent Mode arrives (autonomous tools + loops) 10:00 March: MCP + BYOK (extensibility & model choice) 16:00 April: Prompt files (slash commands) & multiâ€‘window chat 19:00 May: Cloud Agent + PR workflow (parallelizing work; abundance) 24:00 Open source Copilot Chat + terminal safety/sandboxing 28:00 July/Aug: Worktrees, checkpoints & Auto Mode (foundation + smart routing) 33:00 Sep/Oct: Plan Mode, Subagents, MCP Gallery & Codex integration 38:00 Nov/Dec: Background agents, unified view & Agent skills 42:00 Closing, community thanks
